name: 亚当·霍利克
introduction: Adam attended Azusa Pacific University on a full football scholarship. After two years, he decided to leave football and the scholarship to become a music major. He went on to earn a Master's Degree in Vocal Performance. Recent credits include Conrad Birdie in "Bye Bye Birdie" with Glendale Centre Theatre, Connie Rivers in "Grapes of Wrath" with Sugar Creek Opera Illinois, ID Discovery's TV series, "Deadly Sins," Gaston in "Beauty and the Beast" with Plan B Entertainment, Anthony in "Sweeney Todd" with Pittsburgh Festival Opera, Joseph in "Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat", Captain Phoebus in "Hunchback of Notre Dame", Gaston (alongside Susan Egan as Belle) in "Beauty and the Beast" with 5 Star Theatricals, and Lupe in the new musical "Viral" written, directed by, and starring Marcus Johns.
